Description:
After walking down the long entrance hallway, you find yourselves in a large room where there is a statue of Basthet.

Around the statue you see a pile of gold. It seems that the felines make prayers to the statue and offer gold with them.

You notice that this room is well kept, but it seems that the felines do not go further into the corridors leading to the top of the pyramid.
DescriptionAction: Do you want to make a prayer?

    "SSRewardText": "You see Laia perform a prayer to the statue and suddenly a voice echoes throughout the room.\n\n(Basthet) \"Welcome back, my child, I knew you would come.
